cont.entity_a: Linksys system worked well initially but required frequent reboots and physical disconnections to function again. Router has a tendency to drop connections and requires frequent resets. Firmware version 4 is problematic but can be improved with updates.
cont.entity_b: Linksys routers have connectivity issues and require frequent replacements. The router crashes frequently, even with firmware updates. Router crashes when configuring certain settings.

cont.entity_a: Good toll-free support with expert help available.
cont.entity_b: Customer support is unresponsive and unhelpful. Customer service is poor and ineffective.

cont.entity_a: Setup was easy, and the device supports multiple PCs. Easy installation and configuration.
cont.entity_b: Product is difficult to set up and configure. Router requires IT knowledge for proper setup.

cont.entity_a: Firmware is buggy and needs updates for stable operation.
cont.entity_b: Firmware updates are frequent but do not resolve issues. QuickVPN software has compatibility issues with firmware updates.

cont.entity_a: Signal strength is good in small spaces but drops significantly with distance. Wireless range is limited and inconsistent.
cont.entity_b: Wireless performance is poor in mixed environments. Mixed mode wireless only works at lower speeds unless manually configured.

cont.entity_a: The router is not compatible with Windows 2000, causing 'Network Cable Unplugged' issues. The router lacks support for Macintosh users.
cont.entity_b: Router does not support dual antennas for multipath elimination.

cont.entity_a: The router works well but has security and encryption flaws. The router offers good firewall protection and is feature-rich.
cont.entity_b: VPN feature is not reliable. VPN functionality is not user-friendly and lacks documentation.

cont.entity_a: User guide is written for Network Engineers and lacks key information for non-experts.
cont.entity_b: VPN functionality is not user-friendly and lacks documentation.
The router has a high price relative to its performance.

cont.entity_a: Router is prone to hardware issues and may require replacements.
cont.entity_b: The router was defective out of the box and required return.
